Name: Nordlicht
About the game: JOIN US ON DISCORD A journey to the north! Nordlicht is an adventure-game in which you accompany an unusual family on its fascinating journey to the cold north. You control the curious Aurora joined by her best friend, the guinea pig Peter Silie and her clever dad Rupert. On their way, they encounter mysterious star-signs of the polar night, have to overcome nature's dangers and confront their fears. The heartfelt story, the atmospheric music and the hand-drawn graphics make Nordlicht an experience, not only for kids, but all ages.
